translation.en: If you're watching this, then I'm not around anymore.
translation.ko: 이걸 보고 있다면 난 거기 없겠지

translation.en: I couldn't say any of this to your face. It's too embarrassing.
translation.ko: 얼굴 보곤 말 못 하겠어 너무 오글거려

translation.en: For you, not for me, obviously.
You're never very good at hearing how lovely you are.

translation.ko: 할 줄 아는 건 개뿔 없지

translation.en: So I thought I'd leave you a little guide to life without me.
translation.ko: 그래서 나 없이 살아갈 안내서를 남길까 해

translation.en: You've gotta turn the alarm off in the morning, yeah?
If you open the door, it'll set it off,
then the alarm company think we're getting broken into.
If you do set it off, you've gotta ring 'em.
The number's in your phone under "alarm." The alarm code is 8645.
translation.ko: '경보기' 글자 밑에 업체 번호 있고 경보기 암호는 8645야

translation.en: And... put it on "perimeter," otherwise the dog will set it off.
translation.ko: '외부 경비'로 설정해야 개가 움직여도 경보가 안 울려

translation.en: First thing in the morning and when you get in from work.
translation.ko: 아침에 일어나서 한 번 퇴근해서 한 번이야

translation.en: Gotta put the bins out Tuesday evenings.
♪ When I wake up in the morning, love ♪
♪ And I know it's gonna be ♪
-I'll get you some real food later. -[whines]
Okay. Do you have a name?
No, I mean, who are you meant to meet here?
Your dog should be on a lead.
Can't you read? The park's for everyone.
What?! He is not a fat, hairy, nosy cocksucker.
translation.ko: 뭐? 저분은 뚱뚱한 털보 참견쟁이 왕재수가 아니야

translation.en: Well, you're here, so it saves me a trip.
-I don't wanna walk with it, do I? -Why not?
Presumably in your old round, you put things through the door, didn't you?
translation.ko: 아마 그 딴 데서는 우편물을 문으로 넣었겠죠?

translation.en: Mate, there's no need to get lairy.
-Why are you talking to me like this? -You gonna report me?
translation.ko: 왜 그딴 식으로 말하지? - 신고라도 하시게? - 그러죠
- 댁이 해도 됐잖아요 - 난 안 하죠

translation.en: And if I was, you'd be safe, you tubby little ginger cunt.
translation.ko: 그렇더라도 넌 안심해 갈색 뚱땡이 녀석아

translation.en: I remember my first day, and it is exciting, isn't it?
Very dynamic, lots of people in and out all the time.
It's very rewarding as well. You get to go out into the community.
translation.ko: 보람찬 일이기도 해요 지역 사회 곳곳을 누비며

translation.en: And that can be anything from local stories, you know,
Be nice to her, and she might take you to the opening of a new restaurant,
translation.ko: 캐스한테 잘 보이면 식당 개업식에 따라가 공짜 밥을 먹을 수도 있죠
식당 개업식에 따라가 공짜 밥을 먹을 수도 있죠

translation.en: so if you're interested in that...
Everyone chips in on everything, really.
So what kind of thing are you interested in, would you say?
Lots of features. Sky's the limit.
Very smart, very experienced, good guy. Um...
He's not himself at the minute, to be honest.
translation.ko: 그런데 솔직히 지금 좀 힘든 시기예요

translation.en: He's had a bit of bad news. Um...
Um, he was married to my sister, Lisa,
I should warn you, he might...
say a few things that are a bit...
at times, so, you know, don't take it personally.
translation.ko: 다 그렇지는 않지만 맘에 담지 말아요

translation.en: I mean, you will be working closely with him.
I've honestly nothing to compare it to anymore.
But I guess a good day is when I don't go around
wanting to shoot random strangers in the face
and then turn the gun on myself.
-Why are you telling me that? -I didn't say his name.
translation.ko: 그걸 왜 말해요? 누군지는 말 안 했어요

translation.en: No, I know, but... how does that help me?
translation.ko: 그건 알겠는데 내게 뭔 도움이 되죠?

translation.en: I guess to let you know you're not the only one.
Well, the only mental case out there.
the only guy with mental problems.
[scoffs] God, man, where do I start?
Maybe start with me, as I'm paying, but...
translation.ko: 내가 돈 내니까 나와 관련된 거?

translation.en: Terrible, isn't it? Scarred for life.
If she lives to 100, she's only been scarred for seven percent of her life.
You're joking, aren't you? I wasn't, but go on. What have you got?
No, I mean, why would you think I was joking about you being boring?
translation.ko: 아니, 자네가 따분하다는 게 왜 농담 같냐고

translation.en: Have you got a... counterargument or...
-Why do you let him get away with this? -I don't. [stuttering]
translation.ko: - 왜 보고만 계세요? - 안 그래요 내가 그... 토니, 왜 그래요?

translation.en: Tony, come on. What's going on?
Er, we're putting out a free local newspaper
translation.ko: 아무도 관심 없는 무료 신문을 뿌리잖아

translation.en: -that no one cares about. -No, that's... That's not true.
translation.ko: 아무도 관심 없는 무료 신문을 뿌리잖아 그렇지 않아요

translation.en: And that's not what... Can you come in my office?
A lot of people rely on our paper. Not everyone's on Twitter, are they?
translation.ko: 구독자가 얼마나 많은데 다 트위터를 하진 않아요

translation.en: What do you want me to say?
That I'm sorry, and I'll buck my ideas up? 'Cause I won't. 'Cause there's no point.
translation.ko: 미안해, 정신 차리고 살게? 꿈 깨, 의미 없어

translation.en: Look, Tony, I know that you've had issues,
-okay, since you lost Lisa. -Do you reckon...
my wife dying affected me a bit?
Of course, and, you know, I get that. I even told Sandy about it.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 전 다 이해해요 샌디한테도 말했고요

translation.en: The new girl. I didn't want her thinking this place was a madhouse.
translation.ko: 신입 사원요 광인 소굴이라고 생각하면 안 되잖아요

translation.en: Look, I just need a bit of professionalism around here, okay, Tony.
I shouldn't have to explain this to you.
You can't just go around being rude to people.
You can, though. That's the beauty of it.
There's no advantage to being nice and thoughtful
translation.ko: 착하고 사려 깊게 배려하고 충직해 봐야

translation.en: Let's see. If you carry on like this, I might have to let you go.
translation.ko: 계속 이런 식으로 하시면 자를 수밖에 없어요

translation.en: You won't, that's what I'm saying, 'cause you're a nice bloke.
translation.ko: 처남은 착한 사람이라 나 못 자른다고

translation.en: So I'll take advantage of you, like everyone else does here.
translation.ko: 그래서 나한테 밑지잖아 여기 직원 모두한테

translation.en: You'll give me another warning. I'll ignore it.
I'll carry on doing what the fuck I want.
Eventually, you'll give up, and I'll win.
that you won't even question "women's problems."
translation.ko: 사장이 여성 문제에는 토도 안 다는 거

translation.en: Kath's had three periods this month.
She likes Fridays off. You do nothing.
She gets away with it 'cause she's an arsehole.
So, I thought, right, let's have a bit of that.
translation.ko: 그러니까 뭐 어때 나도 그러는 거지

translation.en: Why would you wanna do that?
Why wouldn't you just rather get better and be happy?
translation.ko: 정신 차리고 행복해질 생각을 안 하고?

translation.en: There's only one thing that'd make me better and happy,
and that's Lisa being around, and that can't happen.
translation.ko: 리사가 옆에 있는 건데 그건 불가능하잖아

translation.en: So that's why I nearly killed myself straight away.
translation.ko: 그래서 지체 없이 자살하려고 했던 거야

translation.en: Right, okay, but you didn't kill yourself, did you?
So, clearly, you know, something made you stop.
translation.ko: 뭔가가 죽지 못 하게 막은 거예요

translation.en: The look on the dog's face.
She was hungry, so I thought I'd better feed her.
It gave me time to think, "I should be dead now."
and I do and say what the fuck I want
translation.ko: 뭐든 내키는 대로 말하고 행동하는 거지

translation.en: for as long as I want,
and then when it all gets too much,
That's the worst superhero I've ever heard of.
That's the way it is now.
My job now is to make you happy before you kill yourself?
translation.ko: 매형이 자살하기 전까지 행복을 찾아주면 돼요?

translation.en: That's like a constant ticking clock for me now, is it?
Anyway, that's the way it is.
[Braden] Okay, well, I'm glad we had this chat.
So this is... This is Sandy.
She's just started today. It's her first day, um, so, Tony,
translation.ko: 오늘 입사했어요 첫 출근이죠 토니, 새 부원이 생겼으니

translation.en: she's gonna be working under you. If you could...
translation.ko: 토니, 새 부원이 생겼으니 업무 좀 알려주고 조언도 좀 해줘요

translation.en: show her the ropes, tell her what's what.
translation.ko: 업무 좀 알려주고 조언도 좀 해줘요

translation.en: We're a disgusting, narcissistic, selfish parasite,
translation.ko: 우린 역겹고 자기애에 쩐 이기적인 기생충이고

translation.en: and the world would be a better place without us.
It should be everyone's moral duty to kill themselves.
I could do it now. Quite happily just go upstairs,
and make sure I landed on some cunt from Accounts.
That the sort of thing... you meant?
Um, Lenny, can you show Sandy the ropes?
[Braden] Gotta get the papers out. Thank you.
-[Tony] You showing her the ropes? -[Lenny] Big-time.
Can I guess the bullet points?
Get in. Eat in front of the computer.
Go to the pub. Eat in front of the quiz machine.
Go home. Eat in front of the telly.
Go to bed. I assume you eat in bed?
I have emergency snacks nearby, yeah.
Want me to bring you more doughnuts, fat boy?
translation.ko: 올 때 도넛 더 사 와?

translation.en: Do you mind him talking to you like that?
You don't take any shit off him, all right?
I don't, 'cause I'm not weak like him.
translation.ko: 난 안 받아줘 이 인간은 물러터진 거고

translation.en: [Braden] Um, we've had a couple of calls from people saying that their building didn't get any papers delivered.
translation.ko: 신문이 안 들어온다고 항의 전화가 몇 번 왔어요

translation.en: Okay, look, that's weird 'cause I definitely delivered them all.
translation.ko: 거참 희한하네요 전 분명히 다 돌렸거든요

translation.en: You know you've got to ring a buzzer to get into the actual building?
translation.ko: 건물로 들어가려면 초인종 누르는 거 알죠?

translation.en: A lot of the old people can't get up and down the stairs or go out.
translation.ko: 어르신들은 계단 오르내리기나 외출이 힘들기도 하세요

translation.en: Yeah, I know that, boss. I will be extra careful with these.
[clears throat] Um, can I get paid now?
You will do a good job, won't you? You can trust me, yeah.
Just saw you washing in a puddle from a drain,
translation.ko: 배관 타고 내려온 물로 씻는 걸 봤는데

translation.en: and I wondered if it was a special occasion.
Gonna buy drugs with that and dump the papers in the skip?
translation.ko: 그 돈으로 약 사고 신문은 버릴 거예요?

translation.en: Well, I should probably dump them first, then buy the drugs.
translation.ko: 신문부터 버리고 약 사러 가는 게 낫죠

translation.en: Let's get you sorted, Ray, eh?
If it was a dog, you'd put it down.
I was sort of being nice, that...
Well, don't you ever feel sorry for them?
We say there's nothing going on inside to make ourselves feel better,
translation.ko: 우리 스스로 위안을 얻자고 환자 속이 비었다고 하지만 분명히 뭔가 있거든요

translation.en: but there's definitely something going on.
translation.ko: 환자 속이 비었다고 하지만 분명히 뭔가 있거든요

translation.en: I'll give you a good seeing to.
And don't get drunk all the time, all right?
'Cause it'll only make you feel worse in the long run.
but I have spoken to loads of 'em over the last few months,
translation.ko: 지난 몇 달간 의사 수두룩하게 만났는데

translation.en: and they all reckon it's not ideal to be a fat, lazy, self-pitying lump.
If you put the dishes straight in the dishwasher,
And change the salt every now and then.
The garage is that massive thing on the side of the house.
translation.ko: 차고는 집 옆에 딸린 거대한 공간이야

translation.en: You're always talking about killing yourself.
Also, you should be at work, but you know I'll let that slide.
Come to the pub. Me and Len are going for lunch.
-We used to go to the pub all the time. -No!
Someone will make me angry, and that's the day ruined.
translation.ko: 가면 꼭지 돌 일 생겨 하루 잡치기만 할 거야

translation.en: Yeah, I'll take that chance, Bruce Banner.
Come on, please. All journalists go to the pub for lunch.
translation.ko: 어서요, 저널리스트는 다 펍에서 점심 먹어요

translation.en: We are journalists. We work for a newspaper.
Yeah, and that newspaper is used to line cat litter trays
translation.ko: 그 신문을 노부인들이 일주일에 한 번씩

translation.en: by old ladies, once a week.
And they read it before they do that.
Fuckin' fat cunt eating like a fuckin' slug.
translation.ko: 저 쌍놈의 자식이 망할 굼벵이처럼 씹어대네

translation.en: -Doing my fuckin' head in. -[Braden] All right.
Why don't you throw yourself into your work?
Yeah, but why does he have to do all that "mm mmm"?
And do you think that might be you on this occasion?
translation.ko: 지금은 매형이 그런 것 같지 않아요?

translation.en: As I was saying, why don't you throw yourself into your work?
It's hard for me to throw myself into my work, when my work
translation.ko: 일에 몰두하기 힘들어 내 일이라는 게

translation.en: is often talking to a plumber on the estate
translation.ko: 주택 단지에서 일하는 배관공을 취재한 거거든

translation.en: who's grown a potato that looks like Lionel Richie.
It did look like him, though.
Actually, this is a good time.
We've got some exciting leads at the moment.
A woman called us. When she drags her dustbin,
Woman on Blagden Road woke up Chinese.
translation.ko: 한 여성이 자고 일어나 중국어를 했대요

translation.en: Man who got sent the same birthday card five times.
translation.ko: 한 남성이 다섯 번이나 같은 생일 카드를 받았대요

translation.en: -[Braden] Yeah. -Right, let's get to the bottom of that
[Lenny] I didn't wanna do it in his house.
Go to the doctor. You've got bowel cancer.
Yeah. Leave him there for a while.
[man] When I got the first one, I thought, "That's a nice card."
translation.ko: 첫 번째 걸 받고는 '예쁜 카드네' 하고 말았지

translation.en: And then I got the second, and I thought, "Oh, that's funny. Two the same!" [laughs]
translation.ko: 두 번째 걸 받고는 '둘이 똑같은 게 재밌네' 했고

translation.en: [chuckling] But then when I got the third,
I thought, "Well, what are the chances of that?"
I bet that's never happened before.
translation.ko: 장담하는데 이런 일은 사상 처음일 거요

translation.en: -[man] Are you taking notes? -Yeah, all in there.
translation.ko: - 적고 있소? - 네, 여기 다 있어요

translation.en: Is this going to be in next week's newspaper?
Oh, my Denise would be tickled by this.
Anything that happens, I go to tell her.
Nothing's as good if you don't share it.
but then life throws you these interesting little things, doesn't it?
You can't feel sorry for yourself.
Excuse me. Where's the dog food?
[man] All right, mate. You got any money?
-Why? -I'll fuckin' kill you if you don't.
translation.ko: 왜? 안 주면 확 죽여버릴 거니까

translation.en: Does that usually work, does it?
the threat of death is worse than giving you money,
translation.ko: 사람은 대개 죽는 것보다 돈 뺏기는 게 낫다고 여기니까

translation.en: Or they're worried you'll hurt their family or...
So, I'm not gonna go into it, but I don't care about anything anymore.
translation.ko: 그딴 협박 무섭지도 않고 그냥 별로야

translation.en: I'm not giving you any money.
No, I'm just tired of doing things I don't wanna do,
translation.ko: 아니, 하기 싫은 거 억지로 하는 게 신물 나

translation.en: and we always have a choice.
And if I've read this right,
or hand over my money peacefully...
[Lisa] It's no one's fault what's happened.
You know how grumpy you get when things don't go your way.
But you've got such a good heart.
You're born like it. You can't contrive it. You're just decent.
translation.ko: 그런 건 꾸밀 수 없어 천성이 착한 거지

translation.en: I knew it, first time I met you.
Hit me like a bolt of lightning.
And I've loved you ever since.
[Tony, cackling] You're not a real vicar, I can tell.
-[Tony] What? -Why'd you do this to me?
[Tony] It's good for you. It gets your heart going.
